function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of sanitation and hygiene practices in food trucks","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases through contaminated food","Mitigation":"Implement strict sanitation protocols and regular hygiene training for staff","Technologies":"Food safety monitoring systems, contactless payment systems","People":"Customers, staff, and the general public","Owner":"Food truck owners and operators"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in food trucks","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of diseases","Mitigation":"Install proper ventilation systems and air purifiers","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems with high-efficiency filters","People":"Customers, staff, and the general public","Owner":"Food truck owners and operators"},{"Description":"Crowding and close contact in food truck queues","Impact":"Higher risk of person-to-person transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement crowd management strategies and encourage physical distancing","Technologies":"Queue management systems, mobile ordering apps","People":"Customers, staff, and the general public","Owner":"Food truck owners and operators"}]}
